home.headline: Run your own social network
home.subtitle: Connect with your customers interactively. Share your content, build and engage with your community.

notifications.headline: Notifications
notifications.text: Notify Users via Email and in App based on groups and followers

promote.headline: Promote
promote.text: Promote your content and push it to the top

more.headline: More
more.subtitle: For you as an operator the Ocelot.social platform offers even more

heimo.name: Heimo Rauter
heimo.quote: "Ocelot.social is a user-friendly and cost-effective application for running your own social networks. The personal contact with the O-Team and the professional implementation of our ideas was decisive for our choice."

ulf.name: Ulf Gebhardt
ulf.quote: "Ocelot.social is the solution to operate my tiny private social network."

try.headline: Try ocelot.social for free
try.subtitle: Test the latest version on our staging environment or start your personal 14-day trial today.
